name: Boys like pink and girls like blue
name_original: Boys like pink and girls like blue
description:
my small game jam project,

the theme was 'fighting discriminations", so I took a simple gameplay idea where you have to put people in small cases, according to tropes...
until things change!

play it on mobile for now, a desktop version will appear once I will have completed this project. It's still pretty rough!

please disable Google pPlay Protect from your phone to install the game.
I will publish it on the play store once it will be finished.
